statements: DELETE FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND item_id = 1;
DELETE FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND item_id = 200;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE amount > 100)
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 100 AND recommended_product_id = 200;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_id = 1000 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 200 AND product_category = 'Electronics'
